backend/main.mo: Defines core Motoko actor types for training sessions, belt progress, user profiles, techniques, goals, and analytics data structures. No functional logic is shown, only type and structure definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing draft redeploy features, related files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style map summarizing key frontend source files and their roles across app components, hooks, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_105.md: Documentation for clean rebuild and redeploy of Draft 105 with no code or schema changes, including pre‑checks and procedure steps.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_110.md: Clean rebuild/redeploy instructions for Draft 110 with checklists and backend/frontend deployment commands.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_115.md: Redeploy documentation for Draft 115 outlining purpose, constraints, and pre‑deployment verification steps.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_125.md: Clean rebuild/redeploy notes for Draft 125 with version metadata, checklist, and build/deployment steps.
frontend/REBUILD_DEPLOY_DRAFT_94.md: Rebuild/redeploy checklist for Draft 94 documenting purpose, prerequisites, and backend deployment steps.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_105.md: Template-like redeploy note for Draft 105 covering deployment metadata, status, and step checklists.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_110.md: Redeploy summary for Draft 110 including deployment targets, status options, and step-by-step tracking.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_115.md: Redeploy note template for Draft 115 listing deployment info, steps executed, and failure reporting fields.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_DRAFT_125.md: Redeploy note for Draft 125 documenting metadata, canister IDs, executed steps, and outcome fields.
frontend/REDEPLOY_NOTE_TEMPLATE.md: Generic redeploy note template capturing deployment targets, failure steps, and error output.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_105.md: Smoke check checklist for Draft 105 focusing on login screen rendering and initial load validation.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_110.md: Smoke check for Draft 110 verifying initial load, branding, and console‑error‑free startup.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_115.md: Smoke test checklist for Draft 115 verifying baseline app load and login functionality.
frontend/SMOKE_CHECK_DRAFT_125.md: Smoke check for Draft 125 confirming application loads correctly and logs any console errors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, theme loading, and routing between login, profile setup, and dashboard states.
frontend/src/components/AddTechniqueDial: Dialog component for creating techniques with fields, tag management, YouTube thumbnail detection, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/AddTrainingDialo: Dialog for adding or editing training sessions with date, duration, mood, and theme selection, syncing with backend queries.
frontend/src/components/Analytics.tsx: Empty placeholder component for analytics features.
frontend/src/components/BeltTracker.tsx: Component displaying and updating belt progress with gamified stats and cached belt images.
frontend/src/components/CachedImage.tsx: Image component that preloads and caches images with fallback handling and loading state.
frontend/src/components/DebugOverlay.tsx: Debug overlay showing Internet Identity, actor initialization state, logs, and progress with a toggleable panel.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, profile access, theme toggle, debug toggle, and logout handling based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen for Internet Identity with status handling and introductory UI elements.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileAnalytics: Generates user training statistics, streaks, submissions, and profile details with multiple analytics visualizations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation/editing form handling username, belt progress, gym data, practitioner date, and profile picture upload.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionLogSec: Manages a user's submission log by belt level, syncing with backend data, detecting unsaved changes, and providing UI for adding, removing, and saving submissions.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionSelect: Provides a searchable popover input for adding submission names, filtering options and preventing duplicates.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionTagInp: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/TechniqueLibrary: Displays a searchable, filterable list of techniques grouped by category and allows adding new techniques.
Generates a year-based heatmap of training hours using local-date mapping, theme-aware coloring, and session data aggregation.
frontend/src/components/TrainingHoursHea: Builds a weekly ISO-aligned heatmap grid for training hours, with date normalization, color thresholds, and CRUD operations for hour entries.
frontend/src/components/TrainingLog.tsx: Renders the training log page with charts, analytics, and session management using training data and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/TrainingMonthCal: Displays a monthly calendar of training sessions with date grouping, styling, and month navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and returns a backend actor based on the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWrapper.ts: Enhanced actor initialization hook with step-by-step logging, authentication state tracking, and admin token handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useDragToScroll.ts: Provides a ref enabling drag-to-scroll behavior on any scrollable element.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, including login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, registration, and training-related data using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, BJJ-specific colors, utilities, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/beltStatsCalculator.ts: Calculates gamified belt progression, experience, submission proficiency, and technique mastery from training sessions and submission logs.
frontend/src/lib/beltUtils.ts: Generates belt image URLs, readable belt names, and preloads belt images for caching.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Maps session theme enums to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Implements a simple in-memory image preload cache to avoid image flashing.
frontend/src/lib/intensityUtils.ts: Provides intensity metadata, labels, colors, and numeric conversions for training intensity values.
frontend/src/lib/moodIcons.ts: Maps mood ratings to icon assets and labels, with helpers to retrieve all mood icons.
frontend/src/lib/submissionLogUtils.ts: Utilities for normalizing, finding, adding, removing, incrementing, decrementing, and merging submission log entries.
frontend/src/lib/submissionOptions.ts: Exports a constant list of BJJ submission technique names and a type representing any entry.
frontend/src/lib/trainingAnalytics.ts: Provides training analytics utilities including theme stats, intensity averages, submission counting, time bucketing, and roll averages.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains utility helpers for class merging, local date handling, week mapping, color selection, and heatmap grid generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements a tabbed dashboard UI displaying analytics, training log, belt tracker, and technique library.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s versioned state, a high‑level app summary, and a list of implemented features with IDs, descriptions, synonyms, and versions. Used as a structured overview of existing ICP dapp capabilities such as auth, actor init, RBAC, queries, and profile/session handling.
